page.title: 14Attitudes Customs-My Day
page.content: I like Mondays because it is Guides at night.At 7.30am I woke up with a travelling alarm clock ringing.I get up and have a cup of tea, then I get dressed and ready for school.I wear a white shirt,a grey and navy blue tie,a grey skirt,a petticoat,pants,socks and black shoes.At 8.00am I am ready for school, have my breakfast of a cup of tea and a biscuit then go upstairs and clean my teeth.Then my friends come and call for me,then we start walking to school just talking and reminding friends of things.I arrive at school at about 8.50am and when the bell goes we line up to go into our classrooms.Then we read with Miss Raine for 1/2 an hour.At 1200,I have sandwiches and play out for an hour, then it is library.We choose 2 non-fiction books,then we have French-its fun talking to our friends in another language. At
